select bli.id, bli.user_id, bli.book_id, bli.author_id, bli.create_date, ui.name as userName, ui.images as userImages, bi.name as bookName, bi.code as bookCode, bi.content, bi.update_date, bi.last_chapter, bi.`type`, ai.name as authorName, ai.images as authorImages from book_like_info bli left join user_info ui on (ui.id = bli.user_id) left join book_info bi on (bi.id = bli.book_id) left join author_info ai on (ai.id = bli.author_id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{bookLikeInfo.userName},'%')
AND bi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{bookLikeInfo.bookName},'%')
AND ai.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{bookLikeInfo.authorName},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{ bookLikeInfo.userId }
order by bli.create_date desc
